summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to defense counsel, transmitting the government's response to discovery requests in the case US v. Noel and Thomas. The email includes three attachments related to the case and a tape from the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Noel

events.title: Government Files Discovery Response
events.description: The Assistant United States Attorney transmits the government's response to defense discovery requests in US v. Noel and Thomas.

events.title: Letter Regarding MCC Tape
events.description: A prior letter was sent regarding a tape from the Metropolitan Correctional Center, referenced as an attachment.

events.title: Follow-up Letter Regarding MCC Tape
events.description: A follow-up letter was sent regarding the Metropolitan Correctional Center tape, referenced as an attachment.

keyFacts: The document is official correspondence from a federal prosecutor in the Southern District of New York regarding the case US v. Noel and Thomas.
The government is responding to defense discovery requests, indicating ongoing pre-trial litigation.
Multiple prior communications regarding a 'MCC tape' (Metropolitan Correctional Center tape) are referenced as attachments, suggesting evidence from the jail is relevant to the case.
The email identifies Montell Figgins as a recipient, likely acting as defense counsel for one or both defendants.
